    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean matches(java.lang.String path)
      Check if the specified path matches this rule
      static boolean matchesRobotsPattern(java.lang.String pattern, java.lang.String path)
      Check if the specified path matches a robots.txt pattern
      static java.util.regex.Pattern robotsPatternToRegexp(java.lang.String pattern)
      Match a pattern defined in a robots.txt file to a path Following the pattern definition as stated on: https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6062596?hl=en&ref_topic=6061961 This page defines the following items: * matches any sequence of characters, including / $ matches the end of the line

      • PathRule

        public PathRule(int type,
                java.lang.String pattern)
        Create a new path rule, based on the specified pattern
        Parameters:
        type - Either HostDirectives.ALLOWS or HostDirectives.DISALLOWS
        pattern - The pattern for this rule

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        public boolean matches(java.lang.String path)
        Check if the specified path matches this rule
        Parameters:
        path - The path to match with this pattern
        Returns:
        True when the path matches, false when it does not

      • matchesRobotsPattern

        public static boolean matchesRobotsPattern(java.lang.String pattern,
                                           java.lang.String path)
        Check if the specified path matches a robots.txt pattern
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern to match
        path - The path to match with the pattern
        Returns:
        True when the pattern matches, false if it does not

      • robotsPatternToRegexp

        public static java.util.regex.Pattern robotsPatternToRegexp(java.lang.String pattern)
        Match a pattern defined in a robots.txt file to a path Following the pattern definition as stated on: https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/6062596?hl=en&ref_topic=6061961 This page defines the following items: * matches any sequence of characters, including / $ matches the end of the line
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern to convert
        Returns:
        The compiled regexp pattern created from the robots.txt pattern
